attributes.action: equality between both genders shouldn't be present at any time, under any circumstances
attributes.additional_details: Equality between both genders is a very important issue in the worlds society today. I believe that this issue should not be present at any time, under any circumstances. There are many examples of equality between both genders not being shown that many people do not know about, especially in other countries that still do not understand the problems this is causing to at least 50% of the worlds female population.
